ltex.ignoreRuleInSentence.sentence:
^\QSorting Algorithms
Quick Sort

Heap Sort
Insertion Sort

Selection Sort

Cubesort
Shellsort
Bubble Sort
Binary Tree Sort

Library Sort
Patience Sorting

Strand Sort
Tournament Sort
Cocktail Sort
Comb Sort
Gnome Sort
Block Sort
Odd-even Sort\E$
^\QConnascence — a metric on the complexity caused by dependency relationships (similar to coupling, but it is not the same).\E$
^\QCISQ automated quality characteristics — automated measurement of four Software Quality Characteristics.\E$
^\QgRPC — A nimble and lightweight system for requesting data.\E$

^\QC# IDE's
Visual Studio IDE — Microsoft own full fledged IDE, which boasts up-to-date .NET support.\E$
^\QJetbrains Rider — Jetbrains Rider, is Jetbrains take on a full fledged .NET IDE.\E$
^\QComponent implementation(s) — an implementation of the component specification.\E$
^\QComponent model — defines a standard socket to be implemented by the component framework, and a standard plug to be implemented by components.\E$
^\QDraw.io — an open platform where you can create and share UML diagrams.\E$

^\QC#
Dotnet Core — an open-source, general-purpose development platform maintained by Microsoft and the .NET community.\E$
^\QComponent Ecosystem — Components are designed to be used in a compositional way together with other components.\E$
^\QProgram size (binary) — the size of a program in bytes.\E$
